item.title: Dirty estate entrance nameplate, 25th October
item.description:
The nameplate at the entrance to Arnold Estate ( Jamaica Road entrance) is very dirty and difficult to read. Please clean to enable and maintain readability. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 142-179, Sweeney Crescent, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Street light outside 186A, 25th October
item.description:
The light is scattering into my bedroom and is very bright. This is affecting my sleep. Can shaders be put on the light. As seen in the photo, it is extremely bright into my bedroom.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 186, Grafton Road, Gospel Oak, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Shrubs on entrance to Spring Shaw Road, 25th October
item.description:

item.title: Regular fly tipping spot - HELP, 25th October

This is known problem Can you do something about it. It really affects our quality of life

item.title: Rubbish fly tipped next to telecoms box, 25th October
item.description:
I have reported this rubbish previously over the past few months and nothing has been done. The rubbish contains sharp shards of broken mirror which could harm young kids or pets. The whole area surrounding this fly tipping is also covered in litter. Greenwich or Bexley council should be urged to clean this area up as it is an absolute disgrace.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Okehampton Crescent, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extreme amounts of rubbish at 202 burrage road, 25th October
item.description:
My friend has Autism and is a hoarder, a few people have helped him clean up hus home but there is now a lot of rubbish in the street in bin bags, my friend is disabled and now cannot move it or discard of it himself, can someone come and collect the rubbish as soon as possible because he now has such bad anxiety he isn’t leaving the house. There is rubbish down the stairs in bags and as he is in the basement flat he is now struggling to leave his home
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 212, Burrage Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broadway Market set up, noise, 25th October
item.description:
The market being set up on Broadway Market every Saturday and every Sunday of the year is leading our neighbours to not being able to sleep on their offday. The market set up on Saturday start at 6:00am and on Sunday at 7:00am. Times need to be pushed b
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Broadway Market, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Utility trench abandoned, 25th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodlands Road, Bickley, London
